name: soda companion 20xx
description:
"soda companion 20xx" is a visual novel-type experience designed to be played whilst simultaneously drinking a cold one of your choice — NO alcoholic drinks, however. only soft drinks. alcohol is for NARCS and BOZOS.

programming / main writing by michael "gb_camera" d.
baja blast girl talksprites by @sakuracila
calpico boy talksprites by seirui

features:

  • gender selection (artist's portrayal)
  • soda vessel / container selection
  • the ability to drink soda in the parking lot of a taco bell late at night
  • soda fun facts! (whether they are true or false is up to you)
  • historical philosophical quotes
  • a chugging minigame
  • a baseball minigame ;)
  • a statistics page
  • the world's unfunniest writing possible

controls: alphanumeric 1, 2, and 3 as labeled to choose a selection (the numpad is for LOSERS), the space bar as labeled whenever it comes up

more credits included in the credits file, or on this pastebin
made as project 2 for cdm 175 spring 2022
